name: Karmarama
description: We are a London based independent integrated communications agency, focused on producing highly creative and impactful communications for clients including the BBC, Air New Zealand, Iceland and Honda. We were founded in 2000, with four staff working around a ping-pong table in a tiny office. Over the last 14 years we have steadily grown each year into a successful business with a long list of clients and over 250 employees under one roof.
